description: This source file handles WiFi 802.1X frames, including processing received frames, registering callback functions for transmission and reception, and performing some data manipulation like byte order conversions. It interacts with other WiFi HAL components and manages raw frame data related to WiFi authentication frames.

methods.name: unsigned short be_to_host16(unsigned short v)
methods.description: Converts a 16-bit number from big-endian to host byte order.

methods.name: int handle_8021x_frame(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,unsigned char * frame,UINT len,wifi_direction_t dir)
methods.description: Processes an 802.1X frame received over a raw socket, invokes the callback if set.

methods.name: int data_frame_received_callback(INT ap_index,mac_address_t sta_mac,UCHAR * frame,UINT len,wifi_dataFrameType_t type,wifi_direction_t dir)
methods.description: Callback for when a data frame is received; filters 802.1X frames and handles them.

methods.name: void wifi_8021x_data_tx_callback_register(wifi_sent8021xFrame_callback func)
methods.description: Registers a callback function for transmitting 802.1X frames.

methods.name: void wifi_8021x_data_rx_callback_register(wifi_received8021xFrame_callback func)
methods.description: Registers a callback function for receiving 802.1X frames.

ctags.name: be_to_host16
ctags.pattern: /^static inline unsigned short be_to_host16(unsigned short v)$/
